Resident Representative and Regional Sites

IMF Resident Representative and Regional Offices

Last Updated: July 28, 2017

Lists only the offices with websites available on www.imf.org

A | B | C | E | G | H | I | L | M | N | P | R | S | T | U | V | W | Z

A

Resident Representative Office in Albania

This web page provides information on the activities of the Office, views of the IMF staff, and the relations between Albania and the IMF.

Resident Representative Office in Armenia

This web page provides information on the activities of the Office, views of the IMF staff, and the relations between Armenia and the IMF.

B

Resident Representative Office in Belarus

This web page presents information about the work of the IMF in Belarus, including the activities of the IMF Resident Representative Office.

Resident Representative Office in Bosnia and Herzegovina

This web page presents information about the work of the IMF in Bosnia and Herzegovina, including the activities of the IMF Resident Representative Office.

Resident Representative Office in Bulgaria

This web page presents information about the work of the IMF in Bulgaria, including the activities of the IMF Resident Representative Office.

C

Resident Representative Office in Cambodia

This web page presents information about the work of the IMF in Cambodia, including the activities of the IMF Resident Representative Office.

Resident Representative Office in the People's Republic of China

This web page presents information about the work of the IMF in China, including the activities of the IMF Resident Representative Office.

Resident Representative Office in the Democratic Republic of the Congo

This web page provides information in on the activities of the Office, views of the IMF staff, and the relations between the Democratic Republic of the Congo and the IMF.

Resident Representative Office in Côte d'Ivoire

This web page provides information in on the activities of the Office, views of the IMF staff, and the relations between Côte d'Ivoire and the IMF.

Resident Representative Office in Ethiopia

This web page provides information in on the activities of the Office, views of the IMF staff, and the relations between Ethiopia and the IMF.

G

Resident Representative Office in Georgia

This web page provides information in on the activities of the Office, views of the IMF staff, and the relations between Georgia and the IMF.

Resident Representative Office in Guinea

This web page provides information on the activities of the Office and relations between Guinea and the IMF.

H

Resident Representative Office in Haiti

This site provides information on the activities of the Office and relations between Haiti and the IMF.

Resident Representative Office in Honduras

This site provides information on the activities of the Office and relations between Honduras and the IMF.

Resident Representative Office in Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

This web page presents information about the work of the IMF in Hong Kong, including the activities of the IMF Resident Representative Office.

Resident Representative Office in Hungary

This web page presents information about the work of the IMF in Hungary, including the activities of the IMF Resident Representative Office.

I

Resident Representative Office in Iceland

This web page presents information about the work of the IMF in Iceland, including the activities of the IMF Resident Representative Office.

Resident Representative Office in India

This web page presents information about the work of the IMF in India, including the activities of the IMF Resident Representative Office.

L

Resident Representative Office in Liberia

This web page presents information about the work of the IMF in Liberia, including the activities of the IMF Resident Representative Office.

M

Resident Representative Office in FYR Macedonia

This site provides information on the activities of the Office and relations between FYR Macedonia and the IMF.

Resident Representative Office in Madagascar

This web page provides information in on the activities of the Office, views of the IMF staff, and the relations between Madagascar and the IMF.

Resident Representative Office in Mozambique

This web page provides information in on the activities of the Office, views of the IMF staff, and the relations between Mozambique and the IMF.

Resident Representative Office in Nepal

This web page provides information on the activities of the Office and relations between Nepal and the IMF.

This web page provides information on the activities of the Office and relations between Nicaragua and the IMF.

Resident Representative Office in Nigeria

This web page presents information about the work of the IMF in Nigeria, including the activities of the IMF Resident Representative Office.

Resident Representative Office in Pakistan

This web page provides information on the activities of the Office, views of the IMF staff, and the relations between Pakistan and the IMF.

Resident Representative Office in Paraguay

Resident Representative Office in Romania

Resident Representative Office in Uganda

Resident Representative Office in Ukraine

This web page presents information about the work of the IMF in Ukraine, including the activities of the IMF Resident Representative Office.

Resident Representative Office in Uruguay

This Web site provides information on the activities of the IMF in Uruguay and more generally on the relations between Uruguay and the IMF.

V

Resident Representative Office in Vietnam

This Web site provides information on the activities of the IMF in Uruguay and more generally on the relations between Vietnam and the IMF.

W

Resident Representative Office in West Bank and Gaza

This site provides information on the activities of the Office and relations between West Bank and Gaza and the IMF.

Z

Resident Representative Office in Zambia

This web page provides information in on the activities of the Office, views of the IMF staff, and the relations between Zambia and the IMF.

Regional Offices

Regional Office for Central America, Panama, and the Dominican Republic

This web page provides information about the activities of the Regional Office and, more generally, the IMF’s work on the countries in the region. (Costa Rica, El Salvador, Guatemala, Panama, and Dominican Republic)

Regional Office for Central Europe and Baltics

This web page provides information about the activities of the Regional Office and, more generally, the IMF’s work on the European Union’s new member states in Central and Eastern Europe. (Czech Republic, Estonia, Hungary, Latvia, Lithuania, Poland, Slovakia, and Slovenia)
